summary: A darker, hi-res retexture of Dawnguard\'s dragonbone weapons. Dagger only at the moment.
descriptionHtml:
===DESCRIPTION===

I\'m rather surprised that no one has yet made a darker retexture of Dawnguard\'s dragonbone weapons so far. There is a lovely complete retextured set [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25119]based on an ivory-and-copper colour scheme[/url], but I have a preference for darker schemes. I like the default dragonbone design well enough that I decided to not install one of the model replacers out there, and make my own retexture.

I will eventually retexture the whole set, but given that I created this retexture with my thief character in mind, stealth-based weapons will take priority. Tentatively, the order of retexturing will be as follows:

Dagger -> Bow and Arrows -> One-handed Weapons -> Two-handed Weapons

Textures are currently at 2048x2048 pixel resolution, and a default (1k) resolution pack will be released once the whole set has been completely retextured.


===INSTALLATION===

Extract the archive into your Skyrim directory. Use of Nexus Mod Manager recommended for easy installation.


===UNINSTALLATION===

Delete the \"dragpnbone\" folder within the following folder path:

Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\dlc01\\weapons\\dragonbone

Again, I recommend players to use Nexus Mod Manager for easy install/uninstall of this mod.


===VERSION HISTORY===

0.2 - Bow and quiver retextured, at high resolution. Slightly smoother normal map for arrowhead.

0.1 - Dagger retextured, at high resolution.

===ADDITIONAL NOTES===
The model player character is wearing the Ranger armor set from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors[/url].
author: DragonReine
